Home > For Suppliers > Enterprise Service
Enterprise Service

To join Enernovo.com you should apply and submit the evidence that proves you are outstanding in the industry. We audit each member onsite.

 

The criteria includes but not limited to:

Legitimate documentations

Registration license

Tax license

Export license

ISO system

HSE system

Industrial Compliance

Quality evidence

Business performance

 

Also following processes will be reviewed:

Management Responsibility

Quality System

Contract Review

Product Identification and Traceability
